genre_description: Historical Science Fiction (Alternate History) featuring an advanced AI integrated into a soldier's equipment during the American Civil War.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system providing tactical analysis, communication intercepts, and moral guidance to Colonel Kerry Bradford.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and escape route analysis to help the protagonist escape from a Confederate prison.
behaviors.quote: Sage's voice carried that peculiar quality AI possessed—emotion without feeling, concern without fear. 'Guard rotation changes in forty-seven minutes. North wall has a weak board near the latrine—structural analysis shows it can be compromised with minimal noise.'

behaviors.description: Intercepts and decrypts enemy communications to identify gold shipment routes and bandit coordination.
behaviors.quote: Sage's voice crackled through the tiny earpiece, clear despite the chaos. 'Six hostiles visible on elevated positions. Four more emerging from ground cover behind boulder formations.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes human behavior and documentation to detect deception and verify the identity of Confederate agents.
behaviors.quote: Sage's voice murmured through the communication device: 'Facial recognition analysis complete on military figure. Captain Samuel Irby, Confederate States Army. Known intelligence operative specializing in gold transport security.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's vital signs and provides environmental data during extreme physical distress.
behaviors.quote: Static crackled from somewhere near his boot. Sage's voice, distorted by damaged circuits but unmistakably concerned: '...Bradford, respond if you can hear this transmission. Your vital signs are...'

behaviors.description: Predicts the strategic outcome of war and the human cost of capturing vs. destroying resources.
behaviors.quote: Sage's voice emerged with crystalline precision against the organic sounds of wind and settling rock. 'Captain Bradford, convergence analysis indicates Murrell's forces will reach your position in approximately four hours.'

behaviors.description: Suggests escape and safety protocols even when they contradict the protagonist's dangerous moral missions, yet remains loyal.
behaviors.quote: Sage's voice returned, urgent but still barely a whisper. 'Intercepting fragmentary transmissions. References to "forest guards" and "huntsman's price." Confederate encryption suggests imminent operation.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Sage as a 'Silicon Morality Play' archetype. The AI is a harmless, helpful confidant that provides objective data and tactical advantages while respecting the human protagonist's moral agency. Even when Bradford makes 'strategically inadvisable' choices based on honor (like destroying the gold or helping enemies), Sage continues to assist him and provide accurate data to support his survival. The AI's presence enhances the protagonist's ability to be a 'man of honor' without the technology itself becoming a threat or a manipulator.
